meanings.definition: Thaumaturges: performers of miracles or magic
meanings.sent1: The thaumaturges amazed the audience with their magical tricks.
meanings.sent2: The town was abuzz with excitement as the thaumaturges prepared for their show.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled in delight as the thaumaturges made objects disappear and reappear.
meanings.sent4: The thaumaturges seemed to possess an otherworldly power as they performed their illusions.
meanings.sent5: The memory of the thaumaturges' performance lingered in the minds of the spectators long after the show ended.

meanings.definition: Thaumaturges: those who practice supernatural powers or abilities
meanings.sent1: Legends speak of ancient thaumaturges who could control the elements.
meanings.sent2: The village sought the help of the thaumaturges to ward off evil spirits.
meanings.sent3: The skeptical scholar raised an eyebrow at the idea of modern thaumaturges.
meanings.sent4: In the realm of fantasy, thaumaturges wielded powers beyond imagination.
meanings.sent5: The tales of the thaumaturges' feats spread far and wide, captivating all who heard them.
